sentences.cn: 他的讲话被报以礼节性的鼓掌。

sentences.en: He a dutiful disposition in sending her always a large share of the plunder he made.
sentences.cn: 他总是恭顺地把他掠到的大部分财物送给她.

sentences.en: He therefore rode along with an air of dutiful submission.
sentences.cn: 因此,他一路唯命是从地跟在后面.

sentences.en: He wonderfully cheered up , his dutiful manner vanishing in a great grin and a strong hug.
sentences.cn: 他真是心花怒放, 他本来是尽职任的表态,现在成为咧嘴一笑,和一次紧紧的拥抱.

sentences.en: I am a disappointing, though generally dutiful, student. That is, I do as I'm told.
sentences.cn: 我虽然总的来说循规蹈矩，但依然是个令人失望的学生，就是说，叫我做什么我就做什么。

sentences.en: It is not difficult to be a dutiful child.
sentences.cn: 孝顺他们不是一件难事.

sentences.en: It is said that dutiful sons come from poor families, which is not necessarily the case.
sentences.cn: 都说家贫出孝子, 其实也不尽然.

sentences.en: Meg and Jo fed their mother like dutiful young storks.
sentences.cn: 麦格和裘像一对忠实的小鹳似地喂她们的母亲.

sentences.en: She is a dutiful wife and loving mother.
She is a famous dutiful daughter who takes good care of her parents.
sentences.cn: 她是当地有名的孝女,将二位老人照顾得很周到.

sentences.en: She treated it as a link between herself and dutiful goodness.
sentences.cn: 她把它当作是连接她自己与负有责任的德行的纽带.

sentences.en: She was chiding her son for not being more dutiful to her.
sentences.cn: 她在责骂她儿子对她不够孝尽.

sentences.en: When I have loving parents , it is not difficult to be dutiful to them.
sentences.cn: 如我的父母亲爱我, 孝顺父母并不困难.

sentences.en: When our trainer stopped speaking, there were a few dutiful cheers.
sentences.cn: 当我们的教练说完的时候, 底下是一些例行的欢乐呼声.

sentences.en: With such dutiful children, why bother with crabs?
sentences.cn: 有这么孝顺的孩子, 吃不吃螃蟹又能怎样 呢 ?

sentences.en: You've got a dutiful mother, you have, my son.
sentences.cn: 你那妈很尽职, 儿子.

trans.tran_cn: 尽职的，恭敬顺从的，守本分的
trans.tran_en: doing what you are expected to do and behaving in a loyal and obedient way
